mapper.select: select NOTICE_NUM noticeNum, NOTICE_TITLE noticeTitle, to_char(NOTICE_INPUTDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') noticeInputDate, ADMIN_ID adminId, NOTICE_VIEWCNT noticeViewCount from NOTICE
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET ADMIN_ID = #{adminId}, NOTICE_TITLE = #{noticeTitle}, NOTICE_CONTENT = #{noticeContent} WHERE NOTICE_NUM = #{noticeNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICE_NUM, ADMIN_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_INPUTDATE, NOTICE_CONTENT) VALUES (#{noticeNum}, #{adminId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeInputdate}, #{noticeContent})
